item.title: Elon Musk indicates his new political party will be pro-gun, pro-bitcoin: 'The Second Amendment is sacred'
item.description: Elon Musk is launching the a new political party called the America Party, and has indicated that it will be pro-Second Amendment and pro-bitcoin
